EmailTemplate.name: Discretionary Opener Close Req
EmailTemplate.subject: Request # {!Discretionary__c.Name} - Program # {!Discretionary_Line_Item__c.DiscretionaryEmailProgram__c} Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell colleague,
Please note that Charge # {!Discretionary_Line_Item__c.Discretionary_Account__c} provided (below) are to be CLOSED, per the subject request.
Material: Labor: Travel: Others:
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Please click below to Close .
Close
Thanks
